revised_title: Soft X-Ray Excitation: A Study of Critical Potentials in Iron
tldr: This article presents a study on the excitation of soft X-rays and the critical potentials in iron. The authors conducted experiments using a new high resistance and observed discontinuities in the X-ray spectrum. They analyzed the data and compared it with previous studies, discussing the implications of their findings on atomic structure and the behavior of electrons in iron atoms.
